attributes.action: Renew Uber London's private hire operator licence.
attributes.additional_details: We feel this ruling needs to be over-turned as it ends on 30th of September
attributes.background: About 4 years back a innovate company from the US invented this revolutionary app which matched riders with the drivers. Ever since its arrival in London Uber has not only provided a reliable low cost transport to Londoners but also been a source of decent livelihood for thousands of unemployed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
